name: RaceDay,unofficialFormula1skill
0:
”Alexa, Ask Race Day who won the last race”
”Alexa, Ask Race Day who won the constructors championship in 2017”
”Alexa, Ask Race Day who came third in the British grand prix in 2016”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: race day
des:
Race day is the number one skill you need for Formula 1 fans.

You can find out when the next race is, who won any race since F1 started in 1950, or who won the last constructor’s championship.

Try any of the following requests:
* Alexa, ask race day when the next race is
* Alexa, ask race day where the next race is
* Alexa, ask race day when the Chinese grand prix is
* Alexa, ask race day when the Monaco race is

* Alexa, ask race day who won the last race
* Alexa, ask race day who came second at the Monaco grand prix
* Alexa, ask race day who came fifth place in the Bahrain grand prix in 2015
* Alexa, ask race day in 1999 who came first in Italy

* Alexa, ask race day who won the constructors championship
* Alexa, ask race day who came third in the constructor’s championship
* Alexa, ask race day who came second in the constructor’s championship in 1967
* Alexa, ask race day did Mercedes win last year
* Alexa, ask race day did Ferrari come fifth last year

If you like this skill please give us a rating or review, if you have any comments or suggestions please contact support@educatedvoice.co

This skill is unofficial and is not associated in any way with the Formula 1 companies. F1, FORMULA ONE, FORMULA 1, FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP, GRAND PRIX and related marks are trade marks of Formula One Licensing B.V.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
